org.springframework.web.bind.support

类 WebExchangeDataBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.validation.DataBinder
      • org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder
        • org.springframework.web.bind.support.WebExchangeDataBinder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.PropertyEditorRegistry, org.springframework.beans.TypeConverter

    public class WebExchangeDataBinder
extends WebDataBinder
    Specialized DataBinder to perform data binding from URL query params or form data in the request data to Java objects.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder

        DEFAULT_FIELD_DEFAULT_PREFIX, DEFAULT_FIELD_MARKER_PREFIX

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.validation.DataBinder

        DEFAULT_AUTO_GROW_COLLECTION_LIMIT, DEFAULT_OBJECT_NAME, logger

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      WebExchangeDataBinder(Object target)
      Create a new instance, with default object name.
      WebExchangeDataBinder(Object target, String objectName)
      Create a new instance.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Mono<Void> bind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
      Bind query params, form data, and or multipart form data to the binder target.
      static Mono<Map<String,Object>> extractValuesToBind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
      Combine query params and form data for multipart form data from the body of the request into a Map<String, Object> of values to use for data binding purposes.
      protected Mono<Map<String,Object>> getValuesToBind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
      Protected method to obtain the values for data binding.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • WebExchangeDataBinder

        public WebExchangeDataBinder(@Nullable
                             Object target)
        Create a new instance, with default object name.
        参数:
        target - the target object to bind onto (or null if the binder is just used to convert a plain parameter value)
        另请参阅:
        DataBinder.DEFAULT_OBJECT_NAME

      • WebExchangeDataBinder

        public WebExchangeDataBinder(@Nullable
                             Object target,
                             String objectName)
        Create a new instance.
        参数:
        target - the target object to bind onto (or null if the binder is just used to convert a plain parameter value)
        objectName - the name of the target object

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        public Mono<Void> bind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
        Bind query params, form data, and or multipart form data to the binder target.
        参数:
        exchange - the current exchange.
        返回:
        a Mono<Void> when binding is complete

      • getValuesToBind

        protected Mono<Map<String,Object>> getValuesToBind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
        Protected method to obtain the values for data binding. By default this method delegates to extractValuesToBind(ServerWebExchange).

      • extractValuesToBind

        public static Mono<Map<String,Object>> extractValuesToBind(ServerWebExchange exchange)
        Combine query params and form data for multipart form data from the body of the request into a Map<String, Object> of values to use for data binding purposes.
        参数:
        exchange - the current exchange
        返回:
        a Mono with the values to bind
        另请参阅:
        ServerHttpRequest.getQueryParams(), ServerWebExchange.getFormData(), ServerWebExchange.getMultipartData()
